name: Logseq
description: A powerful note taking and knowledge management tool. Great for developers.

name: Obsidian
description: Another powerful note taking and knowledge management tool that works great with Logseq. An integral part of my workflow.

name: Cursor IDE
description: An AI powered integrated development environment that makes chatting with your codebase a necessary part of your workflow.

name: Hugo
description: One of the fastest static site generators, simple to use, and a great community! Built with Go.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework that lets you add CSS without ever leaving your HTML and makes rapid prototyping simple and fun.

name: Penpot
description: An open-source collaborative design tool that is a great, free alternate to Figma

name: Typescript
description: A superset of JavaScript that compiles to clean JavaScript output.
